##About
This website provides reports on the dynamics and future trends of COVID-19 in Orange County, CA. Please visit the [github](https://github.com/vnminin/uci_covid_modeling) for details on the code, and read the [manuscript](a link) associated with this endeavor for further methodological details.

### Authors
Damon Bayer, Isaac Goldstein, and Vladimir N. Minin

Department of Statistics, University of California, Irvine

Jon Fintzi, Keith Lumbard, and Emily Ricotta

National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
